data.name: BASE_STAT
data.comment: Ex. "Base Attack", "Base Speed", "Base Sp. Defense"

data.name: DLG_ASK_REVIVE
data.value: Will you use a revival item?
data.comment: Keep in mind there is an option to cancel and not revive.

data.name: DLG_DUNGEON_UNLOCK
data.value: A new dungeon has been discovered!

data.name: DLG_EVO_ASK
data.value: Ye who seek awakening... Do you wish to evolve?
data.comment: This text is made to be very similar to the dialogue in Luminous Cave/Luminous Spring

data.name: DLG_EVO_BEGIN
data.value: Ye who seek awakening,[pause=0] let us begin.

data.name: DLG_EVO_CONFIRM
data.value: {0} shall evolve into {1}. Is that OK?

data.name: DLG_EVO_CONFIRM_ITEM
data.value: {0} shall give a {1}, and evolve into {2}.[pause=20] Is that OK?

data.name: DLG_EVO_END
data.value: Ye shall return if evolution is what ye seek...

data.name: DLG_STORAGE_EMPTY
data.value: There are no items in storage.

data.name: EVO_REQ_ALLIES
data.comment: Evolution requirement: have a certain number of EVOLVED allies on the team

data.name: EVO_REQ_ALLY_ELEMENT
data.comment: Evolution requirement: must learn an ally of a certain type

data.name: EVO_REQ_ALLY_SPECIES
data.comment: Evolution requirement: must have an ally of a certain species

data.name: EVO_REQ_ATK_DEF_EQUAL
data.comment: Evolution requirement: the attack stat must be equal to defense

data.name: EVO_REQ_ATK_DEF_GREATER
data.comment: Evolution requirement: the attack stat must be higher than defense

data.name: EVO_REQ_ATK_DEF_LESS
data.comment: Evolution requirement: the attack stat must be lower than defense

data.name: EVO_REQ_ITEM
data.comment: Evolution requirement: hold a certain item

data.name: EVO_REQ_LEVEL
data.comment: Evolution requirement: reach a certain level

data.name: EVO_REQ_MAP
data.comment: Evolution requirement: the floor must have a certain map condition (rain, etc)

data.name: EVO_REQ_SKILL
data.comment: Evolution requirement: must learn a certain move

data.name: EVO_REQ_SKILL_ELEMENT
data.comment: Evolution requirement: must learn a move of a certain type

data.name: EVO_REQ_TILE_ELEMENT
data.comment: Evolution requirement: must be at a location with a certain element (mossy rock, coronet, etc)

data.name: EVO_REQ_TIME
data.comment: Evolution requirement: it must be a certain time of day (day, night)

data.name: EVO_REQ_TRADE
data.comment: Evolution requirement: must be from another team

data.name: MSG_ACUTE_SNIFFER
data.value: {0} found {2} items on the floor with its {1}!

data.name: MSG_AIR_LOCK
data.value: {0}'s Air Lock made the weather disappear!

data.name: MSG_ANCHORED
data.value: {0} is firmly anchored to the ground!

data.name: MSG_ANGER_POINT
data.value: The critical hit triggered {0}'s Anger Point!

data.name: MSG_AQUA_RING_START
data.value: {0} is surrounded by a veil of water!

data.name: MSG_AREA_COUNTER_END
data.comment: Ex. "Wobbuffet will no longer reflect Physical damage!"

data.name: MSG_ASK_NICKNAME
data.value: Will you give it a nickname?

data.name: MSG_ASSEMBLY_EMPTY
data.value: There are no recruits in the assembly.

data.name: MSG_ASSEMBLY_TAKE
data.comment: Ex. "Bulby joined Team Bulbasour from the assembly!"

data.name: MSG_ASSEMBLY_TAKE_ANY
data.value: {0} joined the party from the assembly!
data.comment: The version for when the player doesn't have a team name.

data.name: MSG_BELCH_END
data.value: {0} is no longer ready to belch!

data.name: MSG_BESTOW_ITEM_CURSED
data.value: {0} couldn't give the {1} away because it was sticky!

data.name: MSG_BESTOW_ITEM_FAIL
data.value: {0} doesn't have an item to give!

data.name: MSG_BIND
data.value: {0} is being bound by the foe!

data.name: MSG_BUFF_MIN
data.value: {0}'s {1} went as low as it can go!

data.name: MSG_BUFF_REVERSE
data.comment: Topsy Turvy, etc.

data.name: MSG_CANT_RECRUIT_LEVEL
data.value: {0}'s level isn't high enough to recruit {1}!

data.name: MSG_CANT_RECRUIT_RATE
data.value: But it wasn't good enough for {0}...

data.name: MSG_CHASE_ANCHOR
data.value: {0} is anchored to the ground and can't chase {1}!

data.name: MSG_CLAMP
data.value: {0} is being clamped by the foe!

data.name: MSG_CLEANSE_ALL
data.value: It cleaned up all sticky items!

data.name: MSG_CLEANSE_ITEM
data.value: The {1} in {0}'s bag is no longer sticky!

data.name: MSG_CLOUD_NINE
data.value: {0}'s Cloud Nine made the weather disappear!

data.name: MSG_CURE_MAJOR
data.value: {0} was cured of major status problems!

data.name: MSG_DECOY_START
data.value: {0} became a decoy to attract attacks!

data.name: MSG_DESTINY_BOND_START
data.value: {0} is trying to take {1} with it!

data.name: MSG_DMG_BOOST_ANY_STATUS
data.value: The power was boosted due to the target's major status!

data.name: MSG_DMG_BOOST_LOW_HP
data.value: The target's low HP boosts its power!

data.name: MSG_DMG_BOOST_NO_ITEM
data.value: The power was boosted due to having no held item!

data.name: MSG_DMG_BOOST_REVENGE
data.value: The power was boosted due to being previously attacked!

data.name: MSG_DMG_BOOST_STATUS
data.value: The power was boosted due to the target's status!

data.name: MSG_EFFECT_SPORE
data.value: {0}'s Effect Spore causes status on contact!

data.name: MSG_ELECTRIC_TERRAIN_END
data.value: The electricity disappeared from the battlefield.

data.name: MSG_ELECTRIC_TERRAIN_NO_DROWSY
data.value: {0} can't become drowsy due to the electric current!

data.name: MSG_ELECTRIC_TERRAIN_NO_SLEEP
data.value: {0} can't sleep due to the electric current!

data.name: MSG_ELECTRIC_TERRAIN_START
data.value: An electric current runs across the battlefield!

data.name: MSG_EMBARGO
data.value: {0} can't use items due to Embargo!

data.name: MSG_EMBARGO_ALREADY
data.value: {0} is already under the effects of Embargo!

data.name: MSG_EXCHANGE_HELD_ITEM
data.value: {0} and {1} had their held items switched!

data.name: MSG_EXCHANGE_ITEM_FAIL
data.value: But neither {0} nor {1} have an item to switch!

data.name: MSG_EXPLORER_IMMUNE
data.value: Explorers aren't affected by the move!

data.name: MSG_EXPOSE_START
data.value: {0} was exposed! Its resistances and immunities were removed!

data.name: MSG_FIRE_SPIN_START
data.value: {0} was trapped in a vortex of fire!

data.name: MSG_FLOOR_FILL
data.value: The entire floor was filled in!

data.name: MSG_FLOOR_REVEAL
data.value: All traps on the floor were revealed!

data.name: MSG_FLOOR_ROOM
data.value: The walls crumbled, making one big room!

data.name: MSG_FLOOR_TRAPBUST
data.value: All traps on the floor were destroyed!

data.name: MSG_FLOWER_VEIL_STATS
data.value: {0} is protected from stat drops by Flower Veil!

data.name: MSG_FOLLOW_ME_ALREADY
data.value: {0} is already the center of attention!

data.name: MSG_FOLLOW_ME_END
data.value: {0} is no longer the center of attention!

data.name: MSG_FUTURE_SIGHT_START
data.value: {0} will be attacked at some point in the future!

data.name: MSG_GRASSY_TERRAIN_END
data.value: The grass disappeared from the battlefield.

data.name: MSG_GRUDGE_START
data.value: {0} wants the foe to bear a grudge!

data.name: MSG_HEAL_BLOCK_ALREADY
data.value: {0} is already under the effects of Heal Block!

data.name: MSG_ILLUMINATE
data.value: {0}'s Illuminate called Pok√©mon to its side!

data.name: MSG_IMMUNITY
data.value: {0} can't be poisoned due to Immunity!

data.name: MSG_INNER_FOCUS
data.value: {0} didn't cringe due to its Inner Focus!

data.name: MSG_INSOMNIA
data.value: {0} can't fall asleep due to Insomnia!

data.name: MSG_INSOMNIA_DROWSY
data.value: {0} can't become drowsy due to Insomnia!

data.name: MSG_INV_FULL
data.value: {0}'s bag is too full to hold the {1}!
data.comment: Used when a player steals something, but doesn't have the bag space for it.

data.name: MSG_ITEM_BAN
data.value: A mysterious force prevents {0} from using the item!

data.name: MSG_ITEM_CANT_USE_NOW
data.value: This item can't be used right now.

data.name: MSG_ITEM_NO_EFFECT
data.value: It won't have any effect on {0}.

data.name: MSG_LEADER_ONLY_ITEM
data.value: Only the team leader can use the item!

data.name: MSG_LEADER_ONLY_TILE
data.value: Only the team leader can use this tile!

data.name: MSG_LEECH_SEED
data.value: {0}'s health is sapped by Leech Seed!

data.name: MSG_LEECH_SEED_FAIL_ELEMENT
data.value: {0}'s type won't take on the Leech Seed!

data.name: MSG_LEVEL_IMMUNE
data.value: {0}'s level is too high to be affected!

data.name: MSG_LIGHT_SCREEN_START
data.value: Light Screen protected {0} from Special attacks!

data.name: MSG_LIMBER
data.value: {0} can't be paralyzed due to Limber!

data.name: MSG_LOCK_OPEN
data.comment: English translation is intentionally using phrases that are unofficial, so feel free to use your own spin on things for translation.

data.name: MSG_LOCK_OPEN_FLOOR
data.value: Doors were opened throughout the floor!
data.comment: English translation is intentionally using phrases that are unofficial, so feel free to use your own spin on things for translation.

data.name: MSG_LOVE_END
data.value: {0} is no longer in love with {1}!

data.name: MSG_LUCKY_CHANT_ALREADY
data.value: {0} is already under the effects of Lucky Chant!

data.name: MSG_LUCKY_CHANT_START
data.value: {0}'s Lucky Chant blocked it from critical hits and additional effects!

data.name: MSG_MAGIC_BOUNCE
data.value: The attack rebounded from {0}'s Magic Bounce!

data.name: MSG_MAGIC_COAT
data.value: The attack rebounded from {0}'s Magic Coat!

data.name: MSG_MAGIC_ROOM_END
data.value: Held items and abilities regained their effects.

data.name: MSG_MAGIC_ROOM_START
data.value: Held items and abilities lost their effects!

data.name: MSG_MAGMA_ARMOR

data.value: {0} was trapped in a vortex of magma!

data.value: {0} revealed a part of the floor with its {1}!

data.name: MSG_MENTAL_CHARGE_END
data.value: {0} is no longer protected from move-binding effects!

data.value: The mist disappeared from the battlefield.

data.name: MSG_MUG
data.value: All held items were drawn to {0}!

data.value: {0} is already stalked by a nightmare!

data.name: MSG_NIGHTMARE_END
data.value: {0} is no longer stalked by a nightmare!

data.name: MSG_NIGHTMARE_START
data.value: {0} is being stalked by a nightmare!

data.name: MSG_NO_EXIT
data.value: There doesn't seem to be an exit around...

data.name: MSG_NO_MORE_CHARGES
data.value: There's no PP left for that move!

data.name: MSG_PLEDGE_ALREADY
data.comment: Ex. "Charizard already has a Fire Pledge!"

data.name: MSG_PLEDGE_START
data.value: {0} is ready to follow up on its team's attacks!

data.value: {0}'s Poison Touch added poison to the attack!

data.value: {0} is no longer charged with power!

data.value: {0} is protected from stat drops by {1}!

data.value: {0} was protected from the status by {1}!

data.name: MSG_RECEIVE_ITEM_CURSED
data.value: {0} couldn't accept the item because its held item was sticky!

data.value: {0} joined the party to go on adventures!

data.name: MSG_RECRUIT_FAIL
data.value: {0} seems hesitant to join the team...

data.name: MSG_REST
data.value: {0} went to sleep and became healthy!

data.name: MSG_RETALIATE_END
data.value: {0} is no longer ready to retaliate!

data.name: MSG_REVIVE_NONE
data.value: But there was no one to revive!

data.name: MSG_RUN_AWAY
data.value: {0} can't be immobilized due to Run Away!

data.name: MSG_SHED_SHELL
data.value: {0} can't be immobilized due to its Shed Shell!

data.value: The move is sealed! It can't be used!

data.name: MSG_SKILL_UNFINISHED
data.value: Oops! This move doesn't work yet!

data.name: MSG_SKY_ATTACK_CHARGE
data.value: {0} became cloaked in a harsh light!

data.name: MSG_SLIP_END
data.value: {0} can no longer travel over water!

data.name: MSG_SLOW_START
data.value: {0} can't get it going with its Slow Start!

data.name: MSG_SNATCH_END
data.value: {0} is no longer waiting to snatch a move!

data.name: MSG_SNATCH_START
data.value: {0} waits for someone to make a move!

data.value: {0} is no longer protected from stat changes!

data.name: MSG_STATUS_PROTECT_END
data.value: {0} is no longer protected from the {1} status!

data.value: {0} couldn't steal anything because its item was sticky!

data.name: MSG_STEAL_ITEM_FAIL
data.value: {0} doesn't have an item to steal!

data.name: MSG_SWEET_VEIL
data.value: {0} can't fall asleep due to Sweet Veil!

data.name: MSG_SWEET_VEIL_DROWSY
data.value: {0} can't become drowsy due to Sweet Veil!

data.name: MSG_THROW_CURSED
data.value: {0}'s {1} is sticky and can't be thrown!

data.name: MSG_TIME_UP
data.value: It's right nearby! It's gusting hard!

data.name: MSG_TRAWL
data.value: All unclaimed items were drawn to {0}!

data.name: MSG_TRICK_ROOM_END
data.value: The twisted dimensions returned to normal.

data.name: MSG_TYPE_PROTECT_END
data.value: {0} is no longer protected from {1}-type attacks!

data.name: MSG_UNNERVE
data.value: {0} can't eat anything due to Unnerve!

data.name: MSG_USE_CURSED
data.value: The {0} is sticky and can't be used!

data.name: MSG_VITAL_SPIRIT
data.value: {0} can't fall asleep due to Vital Spirit!

data.name: MSG_VITAL_SPIRIT_DROWSY
data.value: {0} can't become drowsy due to Vital Spirit!

data.name: MSG_WATER_VEIL
data.value: {0}'s Water Veil prevented it from being burned!

data.name: MSG_WEAKNESS_DRAIN_END
data.value: {0} will no longer absorb super-effective moves!

data.name: MSG_WIND_START
data.value: A mysterious air current is protecting Flying-type Pok√©mon!

data.name: MSG_WONDER_ROOM_START
data.value: Special attacks and Physical attacks were swapped!

data.name: MSG_WRAP
data.value: {0} is being wrapped by the foe!

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_1_1
data.value: Hold {0}, and press a key to use a move.\nYou must use at least one move on an enemy Pok√©mon if you want to gain EXP from it.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_1_2
data.value: All moves and Pok√©mon have a type, such as Fire, Water, or Grass. There's 18 in all!\nUse a move that has a type-advantage against the enemy to do more damage.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_1_3
data.value: Some Pok√©mon have two types that can cover each other's weaknesses.\nUse a move that has an advantage against both for exceptional damage!

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_2_1
data.value: Physical moves use your Attack and the opponent's Defense, while Special moves use your Special Attack and the opponent's Special Defense.\nThese stats can be temporarily modified: boosted or lowered by up to 6 stages.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_2_2
data.value: With a higher Speed stat your attacks are more likely to hit, and foes are less likely to hit you.\nThese chances are also affected by temporary Accuracy and Evasion modifiers: boosted or lowered by up to 6 stages.\nJust remember: if you ever miss an attack, the next one is sure to hit!

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_2_3
data.value: Movement Speed differs from the Speed stat! Normally you move once per turn, but being sped up can let you move more than once. If you're slowed down, you will skip a turn each time you move.\nAttack speed is unaffected by all this; your turn always ends if you attack, and you never skip turns if slowed. Movement Speed can be temporarily boosted or lowered by up to 3 stages.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_3_1
data.value: There are 5 major status ailments: Sleep, Poison, Paralysis, Burn, and Freeze.\nIf you're under the effects of one, you cannot be affected by the other.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_3_2
data.value: There are many minor status ailments, such as Confusion and Leech Seed.\nThey can all affect a target at the same time.\nCheck your team member's Statuses page if you've lost track of them.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_3_3
data.value: Every Pok√©mon has an ability, which can make it immune to certain status, inflict status on opponents when attacked, or provide other beneficial effects.\nCheck your team member's Info page to read about its ability.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_4_1
data.value: Within dungeons, you will find various traps scattered on the floor.\nThey can be triggered by stepping on them, or by targeting them with certain attacks.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_4_2
data.value: Use your {0} attack to reveal traps directly in front of you. Traps won't trigger this way, either.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_4_3
data.value: Most traps will affect anyone within their range, while some will only target the Pok√©mon that triggered it! Lead enemies into them while avoiding them yourself.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_5_1
data.value: Hold {0} to turn in place, and hold {1} to move diagonally.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_5_2
data.value: Press {0}+{1} to skip your turn. You can use this to wait and heal from natural HP regeneration.\nMovement and combat in dungeons is always turn-based. Enemies won't move until you do, so take your time to plan accordingly.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_5_3
data.value: Press {0},{1},{2} or {3} to switch the team leader. This can be done without taking any turns.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_5_4
data.value: Press {0} to switch on Team Mode. With this, you can control the entire team, turn-by-turn.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0001
data.value: Let's help each other do well!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0002
data.value: Let's take this challenge on nice and steady.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0003
data.value: It'd be nice if we found even one [item].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0004
data.value: We need to stay on the lookout for any [kind]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0006
data.value: I'll back you up with my [move], [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0008
data.value: Let's find lots of good stuff!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0011
data.value: I've got a good feeling that we're going to find treasure!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0020
data.value: I'm happy to be exploring with you, [player].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0021
data.value: I'll show you how I can be useful, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0022
data.value: Let's give this one our best, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0023
data.value: I'll assist you the best I can with my [move], [player].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0024
data.value: Let's try our very best to find one [item]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0025
data.value: I do wonder what discoveries lie ahead of us this time!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0026
data.value: I suspect that [kind] will be tough to deal with.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0040
data.value: It's a bit scary, but I'll do my best to keep up, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0041
data.value: Please don't get us in too deep!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0042
data.value: We should leave if it gets too dangerous, right?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0046
data.value: I feel a little more secure being with you, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0047
data.value: I really hope we'll find at least one [item].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0049
data.value: I'm not fond of fighting. But for you...I'll do my best!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0060
data.value: You know, carelessness can be our own worst enemy...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0061
data.value: You know, we should always see with more than just our eyes...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0062
data.value: I will support you with my [move], [player].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0063
data.value: We should always look before we leap, don't you think?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0064
data.value: You can trust me to watch out for you, [player].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0065
data.value: If you study your enemy closely, you'll always know what to do...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0066
data.value: Part of a winning strategy is knowing when to withdraw, you know...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0080
data.value: Some wisdom, eh? Haste makes waste, but persistence always pays...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0081
data.value: Wisdom, eh? Fools rush in, but winners walk and wonder...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0082
data.value: Rest assured. My trusty move, [move], will help you, [player]...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0083
data.value: We will surely find ourselves one [item]...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0084
data.value: Keep your eyes open for any [kind]...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0085
data.value: I'll be sure to keep an eye out to the rear, [player]...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0086
data.value: I've done this many a time, but it never ceases to be fun...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0100
data.value: Anywhere you go, I will follow, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0101
data.value: Impossible? [myname] doesn't know the meaning of "impossible"!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0102
data.value: You will surely witness the power of my [move]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0103
data.value: Bah! I hardly see those [kind] as worthy adversaries!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0104
data.value: Keep the goal in mind! Yes, I can envision us finding that [item]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0141
data.value: Let me take on the hard stuff!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0142
data.value: Yeah! No one can stand up to a team as good as we are!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0145
data.value: Don't be surprised if my great [move] move saves the day.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0146
data.value: Oh, yeah! Exploring's great! Who could want anything more?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0147
data.value: Gotta admit that you're not too shabby yourself!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0160
data.value: Let's get the exploration in gear!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0161
data.value: This kind of exploring isn't so bad...once in a while!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0162
data.value: Now don't mistake me for the enemy, OK?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0163
data.value: It'd be awesome if we could get ourselves one [item]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0181
data.value: Where next? I'll go anywhere with you, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0182
data.value: I'll devote my [move] to help you, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0184
data.value: Ooooh! I wonder what treasures we'll find? I'm so excited!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0201
data.value: Let's keep pushing on! C'mon! Time to show 'em how it's done!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0202
data.value: I'll thump anyone who gets in our way, you'd better believe it!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0203
data.value: I can just sense it! Somewhere! That [item]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0204
data.value: You'd better guess again if you think that I'm leaving without our treasure!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0205
data.value: No one's better than I am with the [move] move!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0206
data.value: Er, what? What do you want?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0220
data.value: Say, I've meant to ask! Um... I hope I'm being helpful?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0221
data.value: I'll explore the very best I can!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0223
data.value: We'll have to watch our backs around any [kind] we see!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0224
data.value: Hmm? Is that the scent of [item] in the air?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0240
data.value: You'd better BET that I'll hustle!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0241
data.value: I'm just RARING to keep going!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0242
data.value: I'm not pretty, but I always get the job DONE!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0243
data.value: Let's scout that OUT! Where's that [item]?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0245
data.value: You can always depend on ME, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0246
data.value: No GUTS, no GLORY! And my [move] is all about GUTS!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0247
data.value: What a BASH exploring with you, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0248
data.value: Don't hold it against me! I might SMASH you by accident!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0249
data.value: Wake me if I start the ZZZZs!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0250
data.value: What DRIVE you have! I'm impressed, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0251
data.value: For you, I'll do ANYTHING to help out, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0252
data.value: Gah, don't STARE at me like that! You're embarrassing me!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0260
data.value: No need to worry, my dear [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0261
data.value: It doesn't matter how often you've explored before. It's always beneficial!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0262
data.value: When I get mad...I can be a real fright! You'd better believe it!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0263
data.value: OK! Let's get that [item] to start with!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0264
data.value: Oh! Those [kind] are such a rotten nuisance.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0265
data.value: I'll keep you nice and safe with my [move], [player].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0266
data.value: We'll leave just stuffed with all sorts of treasure!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0267
data.value: I do wonder...what might be up ahead?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0280
data.value: Let me watch your back, won't you, [player]?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0281
data.value: Where are we going next? Gotta make up your mind!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0282
data.value: Oh, yeah! Watch out! I'll let fly with my [move] move!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0284
data.value: It's always a blast exploring, don't you think?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0285
data.value: You're really good at this. I'm impressed with you!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0300
data.value: Study your enemy before making your move, OK?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0302
data.value: Trust me. I'll do my best for the team, [player].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0303
data.value: I'll employ my [move] move for the team, [player].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0305
data.value: I'm just sure that we'll find that [item].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0320
data.value: There's just no downside to exploring, that's for sure!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0321
data.value: May I suggest sweeping the floor for treasure from corner to corner?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0322
data.value: I'm here to lend you my best support, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0323
data.value: You can count on me to keep finding valuable things!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0324
data.value: Mmm-hmm... I'm sure I sense one [item] around here somewhere.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0325
data.value: We're splitting up any treasure evenly, aren't we?

data.name: TALK_FULL_0326
data.value: To be sure, any [kind] will be big trouble.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0327
data.value: There's nothing I won't do to get treasure!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0642
data.value: I'm brimming with energy! \u266A I'm good to go! \u266A

data.name: TALK_FULL_0644
data.value: Oh! Which way do we go? \u266A

data.name: TALK_FULL_0681
data.value: Let us fight complacency! And let us proceed gingerly!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0682
data.value: I'm perfectly fine. Thank you nonetheless!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0683
data.value: I will provide my best support to the skirmish with my [move]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0684
data.value: There may be a trap at hand, so step smartly!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0685
data.value: We must remain careful about [kind] as we stay on the move.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0686
data.value: Let's do the very best we can for one another, [player]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0687
data.value: Let's keep a brave face as we move onward!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0742
data.value: I'll lend my support to the effort with my [move].

data.name: TALK_FULL_0744
data.value: I'm fine. There's no need to worry yourself.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0745
data.value: I can see it...one [item] lying on the ground...somewhere...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0752
data.value: I'm right behind you! You'll get plenty of support!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0760
data.value: I've got you covered! Don't worry!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0765
data.value: I envision one [item]... just lying there...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0772
data.value: FOES WILL SCATTER BEFORE THE MIGHT OF MY [move]!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0774
data.value: THOSE [kind] ARE HARDLY WORTHY ADVERSARIES FOR ME!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0775
data.value: I WILL PROTECT YOU WITH MY POWERS!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0780
data.value: MY FULL SUPPORT IS YOURS! HAVE CONFIDENCE!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0783
data.value: I WILL DRAW UPON MY MIGHT!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0785
data.value: HAVE FAITH IN YOURSELF! AND FIGHT!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0791
data.value: MY POWER...IS YOURS... MY POWER...IS YOURS...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0800
data.value: It concerns me not which enemies await us.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0802
data.value: So be it! You shall bear witness to my power!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0805
data.value: Defeating me? Impossible. That much is absolute.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0811
data.value: What a fine love I have! \u266A For items of all shapes and sizes! \u266A

data.name: TALK_FULL_0812
data.value: As always! I'll do it to the best of my humble abilities! \u266A

data.name: TALK_FULL_0813
data.value: Be wary! So wary! Of [kind]! So nasty! \u266A

data.name: TALK_FULL_0814
data.value: I find that exploring is so very uplifting! \u266A

data.name: TALK_HALF_0001
data.value: I'm hurt a little... But I'm still good to go!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0002
data.value: Thanks for your concern, [player]! You really care!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0006
data.value: I...I'm fine. It takes more than this to slow me down.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0007
data.value: I'm fine! I can keep battling! But thanks for your concern!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0010
data.value: Maybe...maybe we should go home soon?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0013
data.value: Can you please restore my health a little, [player]?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0017
data.value: It's OK! I can keep going!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0020
data.value: The truth is that it's harder to make headway like this...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0021
data.value: I'd be thankful if you could restore my health...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0022
data.value: This exploration has had its share of rough times, wouldn't you say?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0023
data.value: Do me the courtesy, [player]! Don't leave me here!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0025
data.value: This amount of damage? It's no problem. It's hardly a scratch.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0026
data.value: [myname] has only just begun to dominate!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0027
data.value: I'm perfectly fine! Focus your concern elsewhere!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0032
data.value: Not easy... Not easy... All this exploration... Not easy...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0035
data.value: Ha! I don't go down so easily!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0036
data.value: This is nothing! Bring it on!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0037
data.value: I get pumped up in tight spots like this!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0041
data.value: This kind of stinks, you know?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0042
data.value: Hey, how about we hang it up and head home?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0045
data.value: Oooh... It's getting hard to keep going...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0046
data.value: Hey, I still feel OK! Thanks for thinking about me!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0047
data.value: It's hard! But I can keep going!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0050
data.value: C'mon! I can take it! Bring it on!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0051
data.value: Think I'm gonna drop here? Not a chance!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0052
data.value: I'm doing OK! You worry about yourself!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0056
data.value: Got an Oran Berry or something?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0057
data.value: Rough stuff! But I'll keep plugging away!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0060
data.value: No problem at ALL! I can take it!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0062
data.value: Just gotta smile, the way you WORRY about me!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0066
data.value: Oh, I'll be all right. I can take a lot more than this.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0067
data.value: Oh, worried about me? Well, isn't that sweet, [player]!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0070
data.value: You don't seriously think I'll be beaten this easily?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0071
data.value: Let's buckle down and go for it!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0077
data.value: I'm fully capable of continuing! Thanks for watching out for me!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0081
data.value: We won't find treasure unless we can get out of tough scrapes...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0082
data.value: Won't some kind soul heal me...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0139
data.value: Maybe I'm tired... I feel weak...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0145
data.value: I'm perfectly capable of enduring much more!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0146
data.value: This place is straining my endurance, but I can take much more.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0147
data.value: I've endured some damage, but I'm very much still fit and able!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0148
data.value: It hurts a little, but it's really nothing I can't handle.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0149
data.value: I can endure this. Please don't fret for my welfare.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0163
data.value: You don't have to worry about me.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0165
data.value: It seems like it's getting harder.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0166
data.value: Don't worry. I can put up with a lot worse.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0167
data.value: You don't have to worry about me! I'll be fine!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0168
data.value: It's a challenge, but I can continue.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0171
data.value: Is my health down a bit?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0172
data.value: This is wearing me down, but I'm doing OK!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0173
data.value: It's OK. We can ride this out!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0175
data.value: IT'S MERELY A SCRATCH. NOTHING WORTH CONCERN!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0176
data.value: I HAVE ONLY SLIGHT DAMAGE. IT IS NOTHING.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0177
data.value: THIS LEVEL OF DAMAGE? NOT WORTH YOUR ATTENTION!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0178
data.value: YOUR WORRY IS NEEDLESS. ABOVE ALL ELSE, WE MUST PUSH ON.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0180
data.value: THE WOUND IS SHALLOW. YOUR CONCERN IS UNWARRANTED.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0181
data.value: IT IS NO MORE THAN A SCRATCH. LET US CONTINUE.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0182
data.value: I SEEM TO HAVE TAKEN DAMAGE. IT'S OF NO CONCERN.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0183
data.value: THIS DAMAGE? TRIVIAL. I AM INVINCIBLE!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0190
data.value: It appears that I have sustained some damage...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0191
data.value: You didn't seriously imagine that I would be impeded by this?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0192
data.value: My wound is merely superficial. There is no need to fear.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0193
data.value: I will be fine as long as my damage stays this minimal.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0195
data.value: It's now a tad unfriendly here!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0196
data.value: Oh no! Oh no! My health has declined!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0197
data.value: Oh no! Oh no! I've suffered damage!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0198
data.value: Our journey might be spoiled. \u266A But I remain game! \u266A

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0000
data.value: I'm going down for the count...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0001
data.value: Please help me, [player]... I'm about to keel over...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0002
data.value: Ugh... I don't want to faint in a place like this...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0010
data.value: I can't take any more... I want to go home...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0015
data.value: I might not make it... It'll be all up to you then, [player]...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0017
data.value: Oh, blast... This might be it...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0020
data.value: It's gone from bad to worse...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0021
data.value: Ugh, no... Not a place like this...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0022
data.value: Ugh... Is this to be my...final adventure?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0025
data.value: Never! I won't allow myself to be felled! Not in a place like this!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0026
data.value: N-n-no... N-n-never... I won't give up...until my last breath...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0032
data.value: Keeping up... All I can do... keeping up...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0036
data.value: Gah! This shouldn't be happening! Not to me!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0037
data.value: Ugh... Gah... Go on... Go on without me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0040
data.value: Ow-wow-ow! Why's all this pain coming my way?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0042
data.value: Ack... Erk... You gotta heal me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0045
data.value: Oooh... [player]... I just can't go on...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0046
data.value: If something happens to me... You have to carry on...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0050
data.value: Ack! Ack! No way! I'm going out in a blaze of glory!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0051
data.value: Never! Never! I won't give up until the bitter end!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0052
data.value: Ha-ha! Ack! Come on! I'll take it all on!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0056
data.value: Uh-uh-yup...not doing well... Heal me, will you...?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0057
data.value: Just...just wish I could make it back home...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0066
data.value: Now if things get much worse, [player], you just go on without me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0067
data.value: Gasp... Gasp... I'm not...giving up until the end...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0071
data.value: This lousy place...won't be the last place I ever see...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0072
data.value: Ha! No! You're not seriously worried about...me...? What a buddy...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0075
data.value: Ooooh... Don't let me slow you...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0081
data.value: Heal me. You need to heal me. Please, [player]...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0082
data.value: Keeping... Keeping... Just keeping up is all...I can manage...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0146
data.value: My spirit is nearly broken... Please restore me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0148
data.value: I just...won't be able to continue for much...longer...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0149
data.value: This is...certainly...the end for me... Do help!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0162
data.value: It's too hard to go on... Help...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0163
data.value: Be so kind as...to heal me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0167
data.value: I'll drop out if I'm not healed... Someone...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0168
data.value: I... I'm going to fall... Hurts...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0172
data.value: I took too much damage... Hurry, I need to heal...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0177
data.value: I WILL N-N-NOT FALL TO THIS!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0178
data.value: GRIEVOUS DAMAGE! BUT I REFUSE TO FALL!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0180
data.value: HOW DID I SUSTAIN SO MUCH DAMAGE?!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0181
data.value: IT PAINS ME...BUT I CAN TAKE MORE!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0182
data.value: FALL TO...THIS LEVEL OF DAMAGE? NO!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0183
data.value: I HAVE SUFFERED... MASSIVE DAMAGE... BUT I WILL NEVER FALL!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0186
data.value: I PLEAD... HEAL ME... I PLEAD...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0187
data.value: A SAVAGE PATH... A SAVAGE PATH...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0188
data.value: IS THIS HOW... IS THIS HOW... I FALL...?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0190
data.value: Gah! I've suffered more damage than I bargained for...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0191
data.value: I suffer...but there must be something that can be done...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0192
data.value: My health flickers and wanes... If left unhealed...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0193
data.value: My damage is not slight... Have I underestimated the challenge...?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0196
data.value: I feel awfully faint... Please help me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0198
data.value: I am all but collapsing on my feet... Someone heal me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0200
data.value: I might be unable to go on...

data.name: TALK_SHOP_0000
data.value: Always delighted to be of service! ~\u266A

data.name: TALK_SHOP_0002
data.value: OUR WARES ARE GUARANTEED PREMIUM QUALITY.

data.name: TALK_SHOP_PAY_0000
data.value: That merchandise is {0}. Want to buy it?

data.name: TALK_SHOP_PAY_0001
data.value: One...[pause=10] two...[pause=10] three...[pause=10] That will be {0}!

data.name: TALK_SHOP_PAY_0002
data.value: YOUR TOTAL BILL IS {0}.\nCONFIRM YOUR PURCHASE.

data.name: TALK_SHOP_PAY_SHORT_0000
data.value: You don't seem to have enough money.

data.name: TALK_SHOP_SELL_0000
data.value: For that, I shall pay {0}! Want to sell it?

data.name: TALK_SHOP_SELL_0001
data.value: I can buy your stuff for,[pause=10] um,[pause=10] {0}![pause=30] Is that okay?

data.name: TALK_SHOP_SELL_0002
data.value: YOU SHALL BE PAID {0} FOR THE SUPPLIES.\nCONFIRM?

data.name: TALK_SHOP_SELL_DONE_0000
data.value: Thank you! I value your patronage! ~\u266A

data.name: TALK_SHOP_START_0001
data.value: Welcome to my very own shop!

data.name: TALK_SHOP_SUSPECT_0000
data.value: What sort of fool do you take me for?[pause=0]\nEveryone in the dungeon knows what you did.

data.name: TALK_SHOP_SUSPECT_0001
data.value: Hey wait![pause=10] I heard about you![pause=0]\nYou stole from my friends!

data.name: TALK_SHOP_THIEF_0000
data.value: My precious merchandise! Catch that thief!

data.name: TALK_SHOP_THIEF_0001
data.value: Waaah! That meanie stole my shinies!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0000
data.value: Another exciting adventure! Where are we going?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0003
data.value: What will we find this time?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0005
data.value: Let's keep our spirits up on this one!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0006
data.value: I'm ready to head out anytime.

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0007
data.value: I'm ready to head out on another adventure!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0010
data.value: I'm a bit nervous about this trip!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0011
data.value: So where are we going next?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0012
data.value: I'll do the best I can!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0016
data.value: How long before we leave, do you think?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0020
data.value: Oho... So warm here. So nice!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0021
data.value: Oho... No need to hurry... I'm quite content to wait.

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0022
data.value: Oho... I wonder...what if we found a treasure...?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0036
data.value: Time to go! Let's go already!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0037
data.value: We gotta go soon, OK? Or I'm gonna get going!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0045
data.value: What do you say? Where next?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0047
data.value: I'm a little tired of waiting.

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0050
data.value: This'll be a good test for me!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0051
data.value: Come on! Move it! Go get ready!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0052
data.value: Come on! Get a move on already!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0058
data.value: Did ya stock up on food?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0060
data.value: An adventure! I want a BIG adventure!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0061
data.value: Let's go! It's REALLY time to go!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0063
data.value: Let's show some GUTS on this big adventure!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0065
data.value: OK, now! Chin up! Let's discover some treasure!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0066
data.value: Don't you find this so exciting?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0071
data.value: Yeah, this is going to be a great trip, all right!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0072
data.value: Ready to go whenever you are!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0077
data.value: I'm really looking forward to exploring with you.

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0080
data.value: I can see it now... A mountain of treasure...

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0081
data.value: Yes, yes... A mountain of treasure... Sound good to you?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0082
data.value: The waiting...the suspense... It's what I live for!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0138
data.value: Yes, yes! \u266A I'll do my best! \u266A

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0139
data.value: Where, oh, where? \u266A I can't wait to find out where! \u266A

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0145
data.value: I await our trip with delight!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0146
data.value: It would be dazzling to discover something new, would it not?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0147
data.value: I've been ready for quite some time... Shall we depart?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0148
data.value: Let us make this exploration a successful one!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0149
data.value: I can depart at your earliest convenience.

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0151
data.value: How will this turn out? I just can't wait!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0153
data.value: No need to rush! Just get ready, then we'll go.

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0155
data.value: Good to go whenever you are!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0157
data.value: Are we leaving yet? I'm getting tired of waiting...

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0158
data.value: I can't wait to start exploring!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0161
data.value: How this will turn out? I'm so excited!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0162
data.value: Let's head out as soon as we're all ready to go!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0165
data.value: I'M READY! IS IT TIME TO GO?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0166
data.value: WE CAN GO AT ANY TIME.

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0167
data.value: HURRY NOW! THE TIME IS NOW!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0168
data.value: ARE YOU SUGGESTING THAT I MUST WAIT?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0172
data.value: HOW LONG AM I TO WAIT?

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0173
data.value: LET US BE OFF! MAKE HASTE!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0181
data.value: Wherever you go, I shall follow. Let me emphasize it: wherever!

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0182
data.value: The darkness sleeps inside me... I can still feel it at times...

data.name: TALK_WAIT_0183
data.value: Are you prepared to leave? Then let us be off.
